thread.title: BRIEF-Sun Ltd HY Total Revenue 3.52 Bln Rupees Vs 2.91 Bln Rupees Year Ago

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sun Ltd HY Total Revenue 3.52 Bln Rupees Vs 2.91 Bln Rupees Year Ago
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Sun Ltd:
* HY TOTAL REVENUE 3.52 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 2.91 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* HY PRETAX PROFIT 184.6 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 69.9 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* CURRENT QUARTER SHOWS A GROWTH IN FORWARD BOOKINGS, IN SPITE OF THE FACT THAT THE LATTER HAS BEEN AFFECTED BY THE JANUARY WEATHER CONDITIONS
* EXPECT AN IMPROVEMENT IN THE GROUPâ€™S FINANCIAL PERFORMANCE DURING THIS QUARTER, COMPARED TO THE PRIOR YEAR Further company coverage:
